price: 7. Mayee, hubaal diiwaanka (camalka) dadka xun wuxuu yaal Sijjiin.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-fujāri lafī sijjīnin
